desc: Keystone Hardware Wallet: 100% Air-gapped QR code communication hardware wallet for Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT, BCH, XRP, Tron, LTC, Dash, Polkadot, Kusama and 1000+ crypto. Keystone offers convenient cold storage solution with an open source firmware and PSBT multisig support.

layout.text: Discover the next evolution of cold storage.
